transfer_modal_transaction_successful_me: Ha sido procesada la transacción solicitada. La ID de transacción puede ser encontrada debajo.
transfer_confirming_body: Asegúrese de que el destino, cantidad y memo para esta transferencia son válidos.
transfer_warning_irreversible_body: Una vez que esta transacción se presente no se puede revertir.
transfer_receive_body_text: To receive tokens simply give the following account name to the sender.
transfer_send_exchange_in_memo_one: Are you trying to transfer to an exchange? If so put
transfer_send_exchange_in_memo_two: as the Account Name and put the memo code given in the memo field.
transfer_swap_overview: Quickly swap from one token to another using the Telos Bancor Network, subject to each token's available liquidity.
transfer_swap_confirming_body: Please review the details of this swap before proceeding, including the transfer amount, conversion fees and estimated value.
